name: torr-manager
title: Torr Manager
description: Allows connect to selfhosted TorrServer, browse available torrents, select and watch movies directly from Raycast.
author: dannius

preferences.name: torrserverUrl
preferences.title: Torrserver URL
preferences.description: Enter the URL/IP to your server

preferences.name: mediaPlayerApp
preferences.title: Media Player ('iina' or 'vlc' could be better choise)
preferences.description: Select media player app to use

commands.name: list
commands.title: List Torrents
commands.description: List available torrents from your server

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
